Title: We are eternally loyal to you, beloved leader Chairman Mao
Publisher: Kunming Worker's Art United Struggle group (昆明工人美术联合战斗团)
Notes: Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai, Jiang Qing, Chen Boda, Kang Sheng, and Lin Biao, carrying Little Red Books, are standing on the marble Golden Water Bridge (金水桥) in front of, and giving access to, the Tian'anmen Gate Building, being hailed by Red Guards.
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)Jiang QingChen BodaLin BiaoKang ShengZhou Enlai
